name: METAL GEAR 25th ANNIVERSARY METAL GEAR MUSIC COLLECTION
summary:
The Metal Gear 25th Anniversary - Metal Gear Music Collection is a compilation album soundtrack released to celebrate the Metal Gear franchise's 25th anniversary.
    The album was announced on Konami's official store KONAMISTYLE and is released on August 22, 2012 (postponed from July 25, 2012 due to circumstances) for 3,150 Japanese yen under the catalogue number: GFCA321.
    Similar to the previous soundtrack Metal Gear 20th Anniversary - Metal Gear Music Collection the soundtrack contains original and arranged medley songs from selected Metal Gear games. The games chosen specially for this soundtrack are Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots, Metal Gear Online and Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker.
